title: minerjones

content: Four fun Casascius lots up for grabs:LOT 1: 2013 Casascius 0.1BTC S3 "1AgwLJQA", silver REDEEMEDLOT 2: 2011 Casascius 1BTC S2 "1Ca5XpFo", brass REDEEMEDLOT 3: 2012 Casascius 1BTC "1Cs6K6tx", brass DIYLOT 4: 2011 Casascius 25BTC S2 "1GLi&uYx", plated alloy REDEEMEDSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 23rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsLN, ETH, LTC, DOGE also accepted due to BTC network congestion/fees being ridiculous!!Due to logistics, LOT 4 will be available December 1st or after.SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
